page.title: 07Games and pastimes.
page.content: There are a variety of outdoor sports and activities in Indian Queens and district.In the winter various teams play football,and there is a boy'S six a side team that has just been formed. Darts teams from the pubs play in a league against teams from other pubs. In the summer the cricket team from Barnfield Terrace play against teams from other villages. A lot of people enjoy gardening and grow flowers and vegetables. Several of the junior boys from school have small scramble motor bikes and enter competitions.Roger Lobb(7) came back from a scramble in June with three trophies he had won in Somerset. BMX bikes are the rage at the moment, but there is no special track for them to be used safely,so they do tricks in the road.Our teacher says it is dangerous.
